CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL(MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__User__c) , MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__Contact__r.FirstName & ' ' & MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__Contact__r.LastName & ' ' & MPM4_BASE__Project_Milestone__r.MPM4_BASE__Project__r.Name & ' ' & MPM4_BASE__Project_Milestone__r.Name & ' complete:' & IF(MPM4_BASE__Complete__c, 'yes', 'no') & ' ' & Name , MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__User__r.FirstName & ' ' & MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__User__r.LastName & ' ' & MPM4_BASE__Project_Milestone__r.MPM4_BASE__Project__r.Name & ' ' & MPM4_BASE__Project_Milestone__r.Name & ' complete:' & IF(MPM4_BASE__Complete__c, 'yes', 'no') & ' ' & Name )
CustomField.label: Index Helper
